explains: n. [天] 宇宙论，[天] 宇宙学

sentences.en: Cosmology, geology, and biology have provided a consistent, unified, and constantly improving account of what happened.
sentences.cn: 宇宙学、地质学和生物学对所发生的事情提供了一致的、统一的和不断改进的解释。
启示书中还有一种宇宙学。

sentences.en: Matter plays a central role in cosmology.
sentences.cn: 物质在宇宙学中起着核心作用。
